title: Vaibhavam Double Strand Emerald and Diamond Haaram
materials: VVS Clarity). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This magnificent double-stranded Haaram showcases intricate floral and paisley motifs adorned with meticulously set diamonds. The vibrant emeralds add a touch of regality and grace. It uses the pave setting for brilliant sparkle. The Haaram is designed with a flexible structure for comfortable wear. Floral embellishment, emerald focal points.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also perfect for adding a touch of elegance to high-profile events and festive occasions.
description: A true statement piece that blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with exquisite gemstone quality. The combination of emeralds and diamonds creates a captivating sparkle, while the intricate design reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry tradition. It is an investment piece with enduring value and cultural significance. The adjustable length makes it versatile for different necklines and outfits.
